DESCRIPTION: Quote a message with a message id.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}quote [message id]** ~ Quote a message from the current channel using the message id.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}quote [message id] [#Channel]** ~ Quote a message from another channel using the message id.
EMBED: The message is an embedded message so I can not quote it. You can use the link above to go to it.
